name: Wawa Adventure
description:
Wawa Adventure is a short Gameboy-style game where you fly around and try to go as fast as possible! You take control of seven as they try to retrieve their brother six from the not-so-evil KingFoxco. 

Controls are listed in the README file that comes with the game.

Feedback is appreciated as i intend to update this game until it's in a state that I'm fully happy with. Regardless, i hope you enjoy your time with the game and seek future works of mine!
